mapper.select:
SELECT s.id, s.dict_name dictName, s.dict_code dictCode, s.dict_type dictType, s.status, s.remark, s.create_id createId, CONVERT(s.create_time, char) createTime, s.last_update_id lastUpdateId, CONVERT(s.last_update_time, char) lastUpdateTime FROM sys_dict_type s
${sqlExtract}
AND (s.dict_name LIKE '%${keyword}%' OR s.dict_code LIKE '%${keyword}%')
ORDER BY s.create_time DESC
